name: Guard Dawg
description: Guard Dawg is an indica-dominant phenotype bred by RedEyed Genetics. This flower’s genetic parentage is a combination of Abusive OG and TreStardawg. The plant smells of its OG heritage with overtones of caramel and coffee bean. But watch out! This strain packs a wallop and is recommended for nighttime use only.
descriptionPlain: Guard Dawg is an indica-dominant phenotype bred by RedEyed Genetics. This flower’s genetic parentage is a combination of Abusive OG and TreStardawg. The plant smells of its OG heritage with overtones of caramel and coffee bean. But watch out! This strain packs a wallop and is recommended for nighttime use only.

highlightedReviews.text:
Guard Dawg (F4) was the first strain I grew, and I wish I had more seeds. I got the seeds from a free seed exchange in DC and from seed to smokeable weed was about 16-18 weeks with curing included. 

My one plant produced about a half oz and funked up my entire studio apartment with its smell of musky gym shorts! This is a heavy hitter indica and will put your azz to sleep with a few puffs. Be careful with this one and make sure you’re settled when you partake. I am in love with this strain and its beautiful orange hairs and sticky trichomes. You WILL NOT be disappointed with this one. Hats off to the breeders!!!
